EmailTemplate.description: Email to Users informing them of upcoming maintenance
EmailTemplate.name: Salesforce Maintenance
EmailTemplate.subject: PLEASE READ: Salesforce Maintenance this Weekend
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
The Sales Technology team will be launching a global platform enhancement for our Sales Organization. Over the course of the weekend, there will be an interval of time when Salesforce will be under maintenance, beginning Friday, February 23 at 8PM EST through Sunday, February 25 at 8PM EST. Please be aware that during the maintenance window, performance will be impacted.
For any issues or support please contact salesforcesupport@wework.com
Best, Salesforce Support
